Content: 121 Brigade troops of the 12 Division of the Security Force Headquarters â€“ Central (SFHQ-Cen) organized a book donation campaign in coordination with the Colombo Capital City Rotary Club for 220 schools in Moneragala, Medagama, Badalkumbura, Siyambalanduwa, Wellawaya and Thanamalwila Education Divisions where poverty standards are high. The donation took place during May 21-23 in Medagama National school premises and the Royal College ground in Moneragala. The stock of books consisted of past question and answer papers of the Grade 5 scholarship examination and the G.C.E A/L examination also. Major General Nishantha Wanniarachchi, General Officer Commanding (GOC), 12 Division participated as the Chief Guest of the event. Dr Kamal Bandara, retired principal, Mr A.R Rathnayake of Colombo Capital City Rotary Club and Brigadier Nalin Koswaththa, Brigade Commander, 121 Brigade were also present at the occasion.
